name: Starman
description: "Starman: Tale of Light" is a slow paced puzzle adventure, with beautifully crafted sceneries and soothing music.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows Vista SP1+ Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (2,4 GHz) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 320M 256MB DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 550 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
